item.description:
By request: Our first event at a true Boston Dive Bar. This is a true Dive Bar in every sense of the word.

Punter's Pub is the classic Boston Diver Bar. It's the only place outside of NYC that I know of where you can order your food through a hole in the wall. Now you got to admit that's a classic establishment. Cheap beer & cheap food. Come experience it first hand.

Pool & Pizza at Punter's Pub
450 Huntington Ave
Boston, MA 02108

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Dive Bar - Pool & Pizza (and beer) at Punter's Pub - Across from the MFA
